content:
The OtterBox Defender Series is a fantastic choice for protecting your new Galaxy S22 Ultra.

Regarding wireless charging compatibility, I'm happy to report that the OtterBox Defender Series case is indeed compatible with wireless charging. OtterBox has designed the case to work seamlessly with Qi-compatible wireless charging pads, including your Anker wireless charging pad.

The case's design allows for unobstructed wireless charging, so you can simply place your phone on the charging pad and enjoy convenient, cable-free charging. However, please note that the case's built-in screen protector might affect the charging speed slightly.

To ensure optimal wireless charging performance, make sure to follow these tips:

1. Place the phone on the charging pad in the center, ensuring the coils align properly.
2. Remove any credit cards, keys, or other metal objects from the case's card slot or nearby areas, as they might interfere with the charging signal.
3. Keep the charging area clean and free from dust or debris, which can affect charging performance.

You should be all set to enjoy wireless charging with your new OtterBox Defender Series case and Anker wireless charging pad!

If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you'll enjoy your new phone case and wireless charging experience!
